name: Space Epic Untitled - Season 1
description:
Write the story. Wage the war.Mars, spaceships,and revolution! Battle up to 16 pilots simultaneously in an epic space shooter game. Add up to two friends to your ship using the mobile controller app in Couch Co-Op mode for a total of 48 potential players!

You’re an asteroid mining pirate on the run from the law, flying a heavily armed space tug in the battle for Mars and booty. Staying alive means keeping one eye out for rival clans, one eye out for Multicorp security, and both hands on the trigger!

Play solo against ships around the world, or use the free Space Epic Untitled: Controller app to add friends, powerful weapons and exciting new features with Couch Co-Op. Point your phone at enemy ships and fry ‘em! Use video chat to be on TV!Features:
  • Blow your enemies to smithereens in a dangerous, vivid galaxy with stunning graphics
  • Multiplayer gaming for PC. Join Face Base or Bear City in the battle for Mars!
  • Get additional features and powerful weapons with the free Space Epic Untitled : Controller app.
  • Follow the Space Epic Untitled saga like a TV show, with new “Episodes” released regularly.

Play Episode 1 for free on your PC now! Grab the Space Epic Untitled: Controller App from your app store for additional game features like The Engineer action station, that lets you repair your ship and send video communications in-game. Check out our website for more information.

Onward Cydonia!
